panel1.resumen: SELECT COUNT(f.CVE_DOC) registros, SUM(f.CAN_TOT) importe FROM FACTF01 f INNER JOIN clie01 c ON f.CVE_CLPV =c.CLAVE WHERE FECHA_DOC = cast('YESTERDAY' as date)
panel1.detalle: SELECT f.CVE_DOC, c.NOMBRE, f.STATUS,f.FECHA_DOC, f.CVE_VEND, f.CAN_TOT FROM FACTF01 f INNER JOIN clie01 c ON f.CVE_CLPV =c.CLAVE WHERE FECHA_DOC = cast('YESTERDAY' as date)

panel2.resumen: SELECT COUNT(f.CVE_DOC) registros, SUM(f.CAN_TOT) importe FROM FACTF01 f INNER JOIN clie01 c ON f.CVE_CLPV =c.CLAVE WHERE FECHA_DOC >= :fechaInicio AND FECHA_DOC <= :fechaFin
panel2.detalle: SELECT f.CVE_DOC, c.NOMBRE, f.STATUS,f.FECHA_DOC, f.CVE_VEND, f.CAN_TOT FROM FACTF01 f INNER JOIN clie01 c ON f.CVE_CLPV =c.CLAVE WHERE FECHA_DOC >= :fechaInicio AND FECHA_DOC <= :fechaFin

panel3.resumen: SELECT count(CVE_CLIE) registros, sum(SALDO) importe FROM ( SELECT CVE_CLIE, NOMBRE, CVE_VEND, NO_FACTURA, MONEDA, SUM(CARGO) CARGO, SUM(ABONO) ABONO, SUM(CARGO) - SUM(ABONO) SALDO, MAX(EMITIDA) EMITIDA, MAX(APLICACION) ULTIMO_PAGO FROM ( SELECT trim(cargo.CVE_CLIE) CVE_CLIE, trim(cliente.NOMBRE) NOMBRE, COALESCE(cliente.CVE_VEND,0) CVE_VEND,trim(cargo.NO_FACTURA) NO_FACTURA, max(cargo.NUM_MONED) as MONEDA, CASE cargo.NUM_MONED WHEN 1 THEN sum(cargo.IMPORTE) ELSE sum(cargo.IMPMON_EXT) END CARGO, 0 ABONO, substring(CAST(max(cargo.FECHA_APLI) as varchar(25)) from 1 for 10) emitida, '1900-01-01' as aplicacion FROM CUEN_M01 cargo INNER JOIN CLIE01 cliente ON ( cliente.CLAVE = cargo.CVE_CLIE ) WHERE trim(cargo.TIPO_MOV) = 'C' GROUP BY cargo.CVE_CLIE, cliente.NOMBRE, cliente.CVE_VEND, cargo.NO_FACTURA, cargo.NUM_MONED UNION ALL SELECT trim(abono.CVE_CLIE) CVE_CLIE, trim(cliente.NOMBRE) NOMBRE, COALESCE(cliente.CVE_VEND,0) CVE_VEND, trim(abono.REFER) NO_FACTURA, max(abono.NUM_MONED) as MONEDA, 0 CARGO, CASE abono.NUM_MONED WHEN 1 THEN sum(abono.IMPORTE) ELSE sum(abono.IMPMON_EXT) END ABONO, '1900-01-01' as emitida, substring(CAST(max(abono.FECHA_APLI) as varchar(25)) from 1 for 10) AS aplicacion FROM CUEN_DET01 abono INNER JOIN CLIE01 cliente ON ( cliente.CLAVE = abono.CVE_CLIE ) WHERE trim(abono.TIPO_MOV) = 'A' GROUP BY abono.CVE_CLIE, cliente.NOMBRE, cliente.CVE_VEND, abono.REFER, abono.NUM_MONED ) saldos GROUP BY CVE_CLIE, NOMBRE, CVE_VEND, NO_FACTURA, MONEDA ) saldos INNER JOIN FACTF01 factura ON ( factura.CVE_DOC = saldos.NO_FACTURA ) INNER JOIN VEND01 vendedor ON ( vendedor.CVE_VEND = saldos.CVE_VEND ) WHERE SALDO > 0.99 AND datediff (day from CAST(factura.FECHA_VEN AS DATE) to cast(current_date as date)) > 29
panel3.detalle: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CVE_CLIE, saldos.NOMBRE, saldos.CVE_VEND, vendedor.CORREOE CORREO_VENDEDOR, NO_FACTURA, substring(CAST(factura.FECHA_VEN as varchar(25) character SET utf8) from 1 for 10) AS Vencimiento, MONEDA, CARGO, ABONO, SALDO, EMITIDA, CASE ABONO WHEN 0 THEN NULL ELSE ULTIMO_PAGO END ULTIMO_PAGO, datediff (day from CAST(factura.FECHA_VEN AS DATE) to cast(current_date as date)) AS atraso FROM ( SELECT CVE_CLIE, NOMBRE, CVE_VEND, NO_FACTURA, MONEDA, SUM(CARGO) CARGO, SUM(ABONO) ABONO, SUM(CARGO) - SUM(ABONO) SALDO, MAX(EMITIDA) EMITIDA, MAX(APLICACION) ULTIMO_PAGO FROM ( SELECT trim(cargo.CVE_CLIE) CVE_CLIE, trim(cliente.NOMBRE) NOMBRE, COALESCE(cliente.CVE_VEND,0) CVE_VEND,trim(cargo.NO_FACTURA) NO_FACTURA, max(cargo.NUM_MONED) as MONEDA, CASE cargo.NUM_MONED WHEN 1 THEN sum(cargo.IMPORTE) ELSE sum(cargo.IMPMON_EXT) END CARGO, 0 ABONO, substring(CAST(max(cargo.FECHA_APLI) as varchar(25)) from 1 for 10) emitida, '1900-01-01' as aplicacion FROM CUEN_M01 cargo INNER JOIN CLIE01 cliente ON ( cliente.CLAVE = cargo.CVE_CLIE ) WHERE trim(cargo.TIPO_MOV) = 'C' GROUP BY cargo.CVE_CLIE, cliente.NOMBRE, cliente.CVE_VEND, cargo.NO_FACTURA, cargo.NUM_MONED UNION ALL SELECT trim(abono.CVE_CLIE) CVE_CLIE, trim(cliente.NOMBRE) NOMBRE, COALESCE(cliente.CVE_VEND,0) CVE_VEND, trim(abono.REFER) NO_FACTURA, max(abono.NUM_MONED) as MONEDA, 0 CARGO, CASE abono.NUM_MONED WHEN 1 THEN sum(abono.IMPORTE) ELSE sum(abono.IMPMON_EXT) END ABONO, '1900-01-01' as emitida, substring(CAST(max(abono.FECHA_APLI) as varchar(25)) from 1 for 10) AS aplicacion FROM CUEN_DET01 abono INNER JOIN CLIE01 cliente ON ( cliente.CLAVE = abono.CVE_CLIE ) WHERE trim(abono.TIPO_MOV) = 'A' GROUP BY abono.CVE_CLIE, cliente.NOMBRE, cliente.CVE_VEND, abono.REFER, abono.NUM_MONED ) saldos GROUP BY CVE_CLIE, NOMBRE, CVE_VEND, NO_FACTURA, MONEDA ) saldos INNER JOIN FACTF01 factura ON ( factura.CVE_DOC = saldos.NO_FACTURA ) INNER JOIN VEND01 vendedor ON ( vendedor.CVE_VEND = saldos.CVE_VEND ) WHERE SALDO > 0.99 AND datediff (day from CAST(factura.FECHA_VEN AS DATE) to cast(current_date as date)) > 29 ORDER BY ATRASO DESC, CVE_CLIE ASC, NO_FACTURA ASC ) tmp

panel4.resumen: SELECT COUNT(f.CVE_DOC) registros, SUM(f.IMPORTE) importe FROM FACTP01 f INNER JOIN CLIE01 c ON c.CLAVE=f.CVE_CLPV INNER JOIN vend01 v ON v.CVE_VEND=f.CVE_VEND WHERE f.status= 'E' AND f.TIP_DOC_SIG IS NULL
